website_summaries.verdict: The DJI Spark delivers all of the camera drone features most people will ever need in an impossibly small package.
pros: The DJI Spark delivers a tiny, lightweight design
USB charging and advanced features like gesture controls and obstacle detection.
It travels well and is great for aerial photos and video
cons: Flight time can be as short as 10 to 14 minutes
The app can be frustrating to use, especially on smaller screens
And you should expect to buy batteries and possibly the optional controller

product_meta.title: DJI Spark Mini Drone - Meadow Green (CP.PT.000734)
product_meta.description: Color:Meadow GreenThough agile in the air, drones can be bulky and cumbersome when on land. Not so with the Spark from DJI, which won't hold you back no matter what the adventure. This compact quadcopter features an integrated camera with motorized stabilization to capture 12MP photos, 1080p Full HD videos, and even aerial selfies. The drone's compact size, 31 mph top speed, and up to 16 minutes of flight time will appeal to a variety of users, from FPV enthusiasts to racers to those just looking for more dynamic shots than are possible with simply a smartphone or camcorder. The drone features GPS- and vision-based navigation for outdoor or indoor use, a variety of flight modes, and a 3D obstacle-detection system.
